bluej.codecoverage.main

Class BlueJCodeCoverageModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluej.codecoverage.main.BlueJCodeCoverageModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodeCoverageModule

    public class BlueJCodeCoverageModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodeCoverageModule
    Adapter for BlueJ so that it can be used as a CodeCoverageModule.
    Author:
    Ian
